ygData.msgSnippet: OOC:Okay, i have a suggetion. What if we are only allowed to send OOC messages if we have BIC with them. It would save up space. Sniper/Scopronok/Lobstruck

OOC:Okay, i have a suggetion. What if we are only allowed to send OOC 
messages if we have BIC with them. It would save up space.


Sniper/Scopronok/Lobstruck


Sniper tried to listen onto the frequiencys to the battle. He had to 
get out of the cage. He got an idea. He looked on the ground for a 
paperclip or something. He looked around when sunndenly he let out a 
gasp of pain. He left up his foot and saw a nail in it, "Just what I 
need.".....
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scorponok walked around megatron base yelling, "Is anyone home."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Lobstruck walked around, looking for a victim to kill.
